description:
ThemelioBridge.verifyHeader(uint256,bytes,bytes,bytes32[],uint256) (src/ThemelioBridge.sol#421-550) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-headerEpoch = blockHeight / STAKE_EPOCH (src/ThemelioBridge.sol#434)
	-verifierHeight_ != headerEpoch * STAKE_EPOCH - 1 (src/ThemelioBridge.sol#443)
markdown:
[ThemelioBridge.verifyHeader(uint256,bytes,bytes,bytes32[],uint256)](src/ThemelioBridge.sol#L421-L550) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[headerEpoch = blockHeight / STAKE_EPOCH](src/ThemelioBridge.sol#L434)
	-[verifierHeight_ != headerEpoch * STAKE_EPOCH - 1](src/ThemelioBridge.sol#L443)

description:

	- delete headerLimbo[headerHash] (src/ThemelioBridge.sol#532)
markdown:
[ThemelioBridge.verifyHeader(uint256,bytes,bytes,bytes32[],uint256)](src/ThemelioBridge.sol#L421-L550) has costly operations inside a loop:
	- [delete headerLimbo[headerHash]](src/ThemelioBridge.sol#L532)

description:
